Description of incident: Imhoff and Associates, a criminal defense lawfirm notified clients of a data breach when a backup hard drive was stolen from a locked trunk of an employee's vehicle.The personal information contained on the backup hard drive may have included names, birth dates Social Security numbers, driver's license numbers, addresses, emails and phone numbers.The firm is offering those affected 12 months of AllClear ID at no cost. Those individuals with questions can call 1-877-615-3769 to reach an AllClear ID representative, Monday through Saturday 8:00 a.m to 8:00 p.m Central Standard Time..
